blogs.title: Why is Python my favorite programming language to work with?
blogs.description: I can hack out an idea in a night and it just works. That's really nice to have, but is the result of plenty of practice. Lots of open source artistic programs have python api’s. My favorite examples are gimp and blender. This is why I first learned python, so I could use it to do crazy things with existing software.
